p: Based on the AI and PS statistics of geographic location and risk group traits, we rejected the null hypothesis with P < 0.001 (Tables 2 and 3). For the MC statistic of geographic location trait, we also rejected the null hypothesis ( P < 0.05), with the exception of the MC (Anhui) and MC (Shanghai) statistics (Table 2). However, for the MC statistic of risk group trait, we accepted the null hypothesis ( P > 0.05) (Table 3). Both the transmission network and MC statistic model analyses showed mixed between risk group (e.g. MSM and Hetero).
